One-stop mobile app for pregnancy support

An efficient pregnancy cycle companion

A place where expectant mothers and their partners can interact in safety, get advice from professionals including doctors, dietitians, and midwives, and connect with one another.

Get started free Ask for demo

Salient features

Pregnancy progress

During pregnancy, your amazing baby grows from poppy seed to pumpkin.

Learn more
Partner sync

Update your daily conditions and become closer to your partner.

Learn more
Emergency

Send alerts and make calls to people who are on this emergency contacts list.

Learn more
Community

Able to communicate, engage, and connect with one another both privately and in groups.

Learn more
Discover

Access to variety of resources such as videos, podcasts, articles, and user guides.

Learn more
App shortcuts

A quick way to browse and an efficient way to perform common tasks. You can save time!

Testimonials

You don't have to believe what we say. Hear from our users!

About HiMum

This app has exceeded my expectations. Not only does it provide essential pregnancy information, but it also offers workout routines, meditation sessions, and even birth plan templates. It's a one-stop solution that has truly enhanced my pregnancy experience.

Last updated a min ago

I'm so glad I discovered this app

The daily articles are not only educational but also provide a sense of reassurance and encouragement. It's like having a cheerleader by my side, reminding me that I'm not alone on this beautiful journey.
